ptxt.intxrefpoff: Main Bearing, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Removal and Installation:F9Q

item.ptxt: Upper half of bearing (1) has oil groove (2) as shown in the figure.
Install this half with oil groove to cylinder block.
Lower half of bearing does not have an oil groove.

servinfosub.title: Visual Inspection
servinfosub.ptxt: Check bearings for pitting, scratches, wear or damage.
If any malcondition is found, replace both upper and lower halves. Never replace either half without replacing the other half.

servinfosub.title: Main Bearing Clearance

attention3.ptxt: Do not rotate crankshaft while gauging plastic is installed.

servinfosub.ptxt: Check clearance by using gauging plastic according to the following procedure.

s1.ptxt: Place a piece of gauging plastic (1) the full width of bearing (parallel to crankshaft) on journal, avoiding oil hole.
Install main bearing caps referring to Main Bearing, Crankshaft and Cylinder Block Removal and Installation:F9Q .

Remove bearing caps and using scale (1) on gauging plastic envelop (2), measure gauging plastic width at its widest point. If clearance exceeds its limit, replace bearing. Always replace both upper and lower inserts as a unit.
A new main bearing may produce proper clearance. If not, replace crankshaft and/or cylinder block.
